mapper.select: SELECT ORDERT.ORD_PRN, ORDERT.ORD_CODE, PRODUCT.PROD_CODE, ORDERT.ORD_DATE, CORP.CORP_NAME, PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, ORDERT.ORD_NAP, PRODUCT.PROD_NO, PRODUCT.PROD_GYU, PRODUCT.PROD_JAI, PRODUCT.PROD_PG + ' ' + PRODUCT.PROD_PG1 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_PG2 AS prod_pg, PRODUCT.PROD_SG + ' ' + PRODUCT.PROD_SG1 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_SG2 AS Prod_sg, PRODUCT.PROD_GD4 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_GD5 AS Prod_cd, PRODUCT.PROD_E1, TECHIN.TECH_TE, ORDERT.ORD_LOT, ORDERT.ORD_GYU, ROUND(ORD_AMNT,2) AS ORD_AMNT, ORD_DANG, ORDERT.ORD_MON, ORDERT.ORD_DANW, ROUND(ORDERT.ORD_SU, 1) as ORD_SU, ORDERT.ORD_SUNIP, case when ORD_CHULHACHECK ='true' then '출고' else '미출고' END AS ORD_CHULHACHECK, ORDERT.ORD_DANJ, ORDERT.ORD_BIGO, ORDERT.ORD_NAME, CASE WHEN [ORDERT].[ORD_T02] = '1' THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS ORD_T02, CASE WHEN [ORDERT].[ORD_T01] = '1' THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS ORD_T01, ORDERT.ORD_BOXSU, IPTEST.ITST_WP FROM ORDERT INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERT.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE INNER JOIN IPTEST ON ORDERT.ORD_CODE = IPTEST.ORD_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO WHERE CONVERT(CHAR(19),ORDERT.ORD_DATE,120) BETWEEN CONCAT(#{sdate},' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{edate},' 23:59:59')

SELECT ORDERT.ORD_PRN, ORDERT.ORD_CODE, PRODUCT.PROD_CODE, ORDERT.ORD_DATE, CORP.CORP_NAME, PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, ORDERT.ORD_NAP, PRODUCT.PROD_NO, PRODUCT.PROD_GYU, PRODUCT.PROD_JAI, PRODUCT.PROD_PG + ' ' + PRODUCT.PROD_PG1 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_PG2 AS prod_pg, PRODUCT.PROD_SG + ' ' + PRODUCT.PROD_SG1 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_SG2 AS Prod_sg, PRODUCT.PROD_GD4 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_GD5 AS Prod_cd, PRODUCT.PROD_E1, TECHIN.TECH_TE, ORDERT.ORD_LOT, ORDERT.ORD_GYU, ROUND(ORD_AMNT,2) AS ORD_AMNT, ORD_DANG, ORDERT.ORD_MON, ORDERT.ORD_DANW, ROUND(ORDERT.ORD_SU, 1) as ORD_SU, ORDERT.ORD_SUNIP, case when ORD_CHULHACHECK ='true' then '출고' else '미출고' END AS ORD_CHULHACHECK, ORDERT.ORD_DANJ, ORDERT.ORD_BIGO, ORDERT.ORD_NAME, CASE WHEN [ORDERT].[ORD_T02] = '1' THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS ORD_T02, CASE WHEN [ORDERT].[ORD_T01] = '1' THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS ORD_T01, ORDERT.ORD_BOXSU, IPTEST.ITST_WP FROM ORDERT INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERT.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE INNER JOIN IPTEST ON ORDERT.ORD_CODE = IPTEST.ORD_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ORD_DATE,CORP_NAME,PROD_NAME,PROD_NO) AS ROW_NUM ,LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, ORD_DATE, 120), 10) as ORD_DATE, dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NO, SUM(dbo.ORDERT.ORD_SU) AS ORD_SU, ROUND(SUM(dbo.ORDERT.ORD_MON),2) AS ORD_Mon, str(PRODUCT.PROD_DANG,16,1) as PROD_DANG FROM dbo.ORDERT INNER JOIN dbo.PRODUCT ON dbo.ORDERT.PROD_CODE = dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN dbo.CORP ON dbo.PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = dbo.CORP.CORP_CODE WHERE dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE between #{sdate} and #{edate} GROUP BY dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE, dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NO,dbo.product.prod_dang

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ORD_DATE,CORP_NAME) AS ROW_NUM, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, ORD_DATE, 120), 10) as ORD_DATE,dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME, SUM(dbo.ORDERT.ORD_MON) AS ORD_MON FROM dbo.ORDERT INNER JOIN dbo.PRODUCT ON dbo.ORDERT.PROD_CODE = dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN dbo.CORP ON dbo.PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = dbo.CORP.CORP_CODE where dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE between #{sdate} and #{edate} GROUP BY dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE, dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME

SELECT PRODUCT.PROD_CODE, CORP.CORP_NAME, PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, PRODUCT.PROD_NO, PRODUCT.PROD_GYU, PRODUCT.PROD_JAI, TECHIN.TECH_TE, CONCAT(PRODUCT.PROD_PG,' ',PRODUCT.PROD_PG1,'~',PRODUCT.PROD_PG2) AS Prod_PG, CONCAT(PRODUCT.PROD_SG,' ',PRODUCT.PROD_SG1,'~',PRODUCT.PROD_SG2) AS Prod_SG, CONCAT(PRODUCT.PROD_GD4,'~',PRODUCT.PROD_GD5) AS Prod_Cd, PRODUCT.PROD_GUBN, PRODUCT.PROD_E1, PRODUCT.PROD_E3, PRODUCT.PROD_DANW, PRODUCT.PROD_DANJ, PRODUCT.PROD_DANG, PRODUCT.PROD_CNO, PRODUCT.PROD_GD1, PRODUCT.PROD_GD2, PRODUCT.PROD_GD3, PRODUCT.PROD_BOXSU FROM PRODUCT INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO
mapper.insert:
select isnull(MAX(ORD_CODE), cast(substring(CONCAT(#{ord_code},''), 3, 8)+'000' AS numeric))+1 from ORDERT where ord_code>cast(substring(CONCAT(#{ord_code},''), 3, 8)+'000' AS numeric)
INSERT INTO ORDERT (ORD_CODE, ORD_PRN, ORD_INPUT, PROD_CODE, ORD_DATE, ORD_NAP, ORD_LOT, ORD_DANW, ORD_DANG, ORD_DANJ, ORD_SU, ORD_AMNT, ORD_MON, ORD_NAME, ORD_GYU, ORD_SUNIP,ORD_BOXSU) VALUES( #{ord_code}, 0 , #{ord_date}, #{prod_code}, #{ord_date}, DATEADD(DAY,10,#{ord_date}), '', #{ord_danw}, #{ord_dang}, #{ord_danj}, #{ord_su}, #{ord_amnt}, #{ord_mon}, #{ord_name}, '', '선입1', #{ord_boxsu})

INSERT INTO IPTEST( ITST_CODE, ORD_CODE, ITST_POOR, ITST_DATE, ITST_WP, ITST_WN, ITST_WS, ITST_SU, ITST_05N, ITST_05S, ITST_03N, ITST_03S, ITST_01N, ITST_01S, ITST_051, ITST_052, ITST_053, ITST_054, ITST_055, ITST_031, ITST_032, ITST_033, ITST_034, ITST_035, ITST_011, ITST_012, ITST_013, ITST_014, ITST_015, ITST_P,ITST_06N,ITST_06S,ITST_07N,ITST_07S,ITST_08N,ITST_08S, ITST_04N,ITST_04S,ITST_02N,ITST_02S,ITST_11N, ITST_12N, ITST_121, ITST_122, ITST_123, ITST_124, ITST_111, ITST_112, ITST_113, ITST_114 ) SELECT ISNULL(MAX(ITST_CODE), 0)+1, #{ord_code}, '', #{ord_date}, '검사대기', '외관', '녹없을것', '5EA', '가공칩', '가공칩없을것', '이물질', '이물질없을것', '찍힘', '찍힘없을것', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', #{ord_name}, #{prod_chisu1n},#{prod_chisu1s},#{prod_chisu2n},#{prod_chisu2s}, #{prod_chisu3n},#{prod_chisu3s}, #{prod_chisu4n},#{prod_chisu4s},#{prod_chisu5n},#{prod_chisu5s}, 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK', 'OK' FROM IPTEST
